content.rendered:
2019 Peach Bowl Tickets

Your 2019 Peach Bowl package includes your choice of tickets anywhere in the incredible Mercedes-Benz Stadium. Touting itself as “the finest sports and entertainment facility in the world” and promising “the ultimate fan experience,” Mercedes-Benz Stadium might just be as exciting as the game itself. The stadium opened in August 2017 at a cost of $1.5 billion. Your 2019 Peach Bowl tickets will give you access to experience this one-of-a-kind venue. Unique features include a pinwheel-style, eight-panel retractable roof, a glass wall that opens to allow for fresh air, and an unparalleled LED display comprised of a 58-foot by 1100-foot circular LED scoreboard. In case that wasn’t enough, another 20,000 square feet of LED boards will be added in other locations throughout the stadium. The stadium was designed with the fan experience in mind and promises a wide variety of affordable food, wider seats, and quick access into the stadium and at concessions.

2019 Peach Bowl Seating Categories

Upper Level End / Corner
Sections: 301-308 / 315-336 / 343-350

Upper Level Side
Sections: 309-314 / 337-342

Lower Level End / Corner
Sections: 101-106 / 114-124 / 132-136

Lower Level Side
Sections: 107 / 113 / 125 / 131

Lower Level Side Club
Sections: C108-C112 / C126-C130
